description: React functional component for a sidebar filter menu in an e-commerce front-end. It manages filter groups like sizes, colors, collections, etc., allowing users to toggle filters and clear all selections.

methods.name: FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear })
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering filter options, managing user interactions for toggling filters, clearing filters, and displaying active filter 'chips'.

ctags.name: FiltersSidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear }) {$/
